text: Richard Robert "Dick" Latessa (September 15, 1929 - December 19, 2016) was an American stage, movie, and television actor. He was born in Cleveland, Ohio. He was known for his stage role as Wilbur in the musical Hairspray. In 2003, he won a Tony Award and Drama Desk Award in 2003. Latessa died of heart failure in Manhattan, New York City, New York on December 19, 2016, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * * TonyAwards.com Interview with Dick Latessa Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:1929 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Cleveland Category:Actors from New York City
title: Dick Latessa
